message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $18,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping if you could lower the price to $16,000. I appreciate your consideration.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm not able to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $17,000.  Let's see if we can make this work.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and would like to counter with $16,500. This seems to be a fair compromise between our prices. I hope this meets your expectations.
